quote: Mental health is not a destination, but a process. It’s about how you drive, not where you’re going.
author: Noam Shpancer

quote: You, yourself, as much as anybody in the entire universe, deserve your love and affection.
author: Buddha

quote: What mental health needs is more sunlight, more candor, and more unashamed conversation.
author: Glenn Close

quote: Self-care is how you take your power back.
author: Lalah Delia

quote: Your mental health is everything – prioritize it. Make the time like your life depends on it, because it does.
author: Mel Robbins

quote: The only journey is the journey within.
author: Rainer Maria Rilke

quote: Happiness can be found even in the darkest of times, if one only remembers to turn on the light.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: Not until we are lost do we begin to understand ourselves.
author: Henry David Thoreau

quote: You don’t have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
author: Dan Millman

quote: Mental health problems don’t define who you are. They are something you experience. You walk in the rain and you feel the rain, but, importantly, YOU ARE NOT THE RAIN.
author: Matt Haig

quote: If you can't fly, then run, if you can't run then walk, if you can't walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: Don’t believe everything you think.
author: Unknown

quote: It's okay to not be okay. Just don't give up.
author: Unknown

quote: The bravest thing I ever did was continuing my life when I wanted to die.
author: Juliette Lewis

quote: Healing takes time, and asking for help is a courageous step.
author: Mariska Hargitay

quote: You are not your illness. You have an individual story to tell. You have a name, a history, a personality. Staying yourself is part of the battle.
author: Julian Seifter

quote: There is hope, even when your brain tells you there isn’t.
author: John Green

quote: You are not alone. You are seen. I am with you. You are not alone.
author: Shonda Rhimes

quote: You are the one thing in this world, above all other things, that you must never give up on.
author: Lili Reinhart

quote: Sometimes the people around you won’t understand your journey. They don’t need to; it’s not for them.
author: Joubert Botha

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle

quote: Feelings are just visitors, let them come and go.
author: Mooji

quote: No need to hurry. No need to sparkle. No need to be anybody but oneself.
author: Virginia Woolf

quote: Your present circumstances don’t determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
author: Nido Qubein

quote: The best way out is always through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: Out of suffering have emerged the strongest souls; the most massive characters are seared with scars.
author: Kahlil Gibran

quote: There is no standard normal. Normal is subjective. There are seven billion versions of normal on this planet.
author: Matt Haig

quote: Vulnerability sounds like truth and feels like courage. Truth and courage aren’t always comfortable, but they’re never weakness.
author: Brené Brown

quote: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
author: William James

quote: When you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change.
author: Wayne Dyer

quote: There is a crack in everything, that’s how the light gets in.
author: Leonard Cohen

quote: Healing doesn’t mean the damage never existed. It means the damage no longer controls our lives.
author: Akshay Dubey

quote: You are not weak for struggling. You are strong for continuing to fight.
author: Unknown

quote: Our wounds are often the openings into the best and most beautiful parts of us.
author: David Richo

quote: Your mind is a powerful thing. When you fill it with positive thoughts, your life will start to change.
author: Unknown

quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: You are never too broken to be fixed.
author: Unknown

quote: Promise me you’ll always remember: You’re braver than you believe, and stronger than you seem, and smarter than you think.
author: A.A. Milne

quote: You have been criticizing yourself for years and it hasn’t worked. Try approving of yourself and see what happens.
author: Louise Hay

quote: I am not afraid of storms for I am learning how to sail my ship.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: Your struggle is part of your story.
author: Unknown

quote: Life doesn’t make any sense without interdependence. We need each other, and the sooner we learn that, the better for us all.
author: Erik Erikson

quote: Sometimes the hardest part of the journey is believing you’re worthy of the trip.
author: Glenn Beck

quote: You are so much more than what you’re going through.
author: John Tew

quote: There is no health without mental health.
author: David Satcher

quote: The strongest people are those who win battles we know nothing about.
author: Unknown

quote: You don’t have to be positive all the time. It’s perfectly okay to feel sad, angry, annoyed, frustrated, scared, and anxious. Having feelings doesn’t make you a negative person. It makes you human.
author: Lori Deschene

quote: It’s not the days in life we remember, rather the moments.
author: Walt Disney

quote: Sometimes the most important thing in a whole day is the rest we take between two deep breaths.
author: Etty Hillesum

quote: Healing is not linear.
author: Unknown
